div.class: sqs-layout sqs-grid-12 columns-12 Intro-content sqs-alternate-block-style-container empty

p.strong: Please Note: The Laurel SD facilities will not be open to any activity or organization while the school district is closed by order of Governor Wolf.

div.p: In a response to Governor Wolf’s ordering the closure of all Pennsylvania Schools for the remainder of the school year we have updated our website to make it easier to support the transition to Virtual Learning. The new design will provide the most frequently used links for Virtual Learning in one or two clicks at most, including the attendance forms. Please be sure to visit our new Virtual Learning Hub which we created to make it easier to locate some of the most common used resources. Please be sure to bookmark this page and check in on a regular basis as the website is frequently updated.
div.h3: Keep up with all of our related COVID-19 updates HERE or click on the image below

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

div.p: Laurel, a community dedicated to excellence, is committed to challenging and equipping students to become knowledgeable, responsible, and engaged contributors to an ever-changing global society.

h2.a: Click here for the Executive Summary of the Laurel SD FY19-20 Approved Budget
